languages.text: {n}Человек, которого вы видели среди гостей, ожидает вас в ваших покоях с таким видом, словно и должен здесь быть. Он бросает на вас холодный взгляд — оценивающий, сверху вниз. Прежде лишь Теодора позволяла себе так смотреть на вас.{/n} "Нам есть о чем побеседовать, {name} фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек в одеянии служителя Инквизиции, которого вы видели среди гостей, ожидает вас в ваших покоях с таким видом, словно и должен здесь быть.{/n} "У вас ведь есть время для небольшой беседы?"

languages.text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек, которого вы видели среди гостей, ожидает вас в ваших покоях с таким видом, словно и должен здесь быть. Он бросает на вас холодный взгляд — оценивающий, сверху вниз. Прежде лишь Теодора позволяла себе так смотреть на вас.{/n} "Нам есть о чем побеседовать, {name} фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}The same man in Inquisition raiments whom you saw among the guests awaits you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be here. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you, from top to bottom. No one save for Theodora has ever allowed themselves to look at you this way before.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

{n}The same man in Inquisition raiments whom you saw among the guests awaits you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be here. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you, from top to bottom. No one save for Theodora has ever allowed themselves to look at you this way before.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

{n}The same man you saw among your guests, the one dressed in the garb of a member of the Inquisition, is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

{n}The same man you saw among your guests, the one dressed in the garb of a member of the Inquisition, is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

{n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}ゲストたちの中で見かけた男が、さも当然かのように部屋で待っている。男は冷たい視線でこちらを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで値踏みする。そのような眼差しを向けていいのはシオドーラだけだ。{/n}「話がある、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス」
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゲストたちの中で見かけた男が、さも当然かのように部屋で待っている。男は冷たい視線でこちらを頭のてっぺんからつま先まで値踏みする。そのような眼差しを向けていいのはシオドーラだけだ。{/n}「話がある、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス」

languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss,  von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}你刚刚在宾客中看到的那个人，此刻正在房间里等着你，脸上挂着一副理所当然的表情。他用冷峻的目光把你从头到脚打量了一番。除了西奥多拉，还从没有人敢这样放肆对你。{/n}“我们来谈一谈吧，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。”
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚在宾客中看到的那个人，此刻正在房间里等着你，脸上挂着一副理所当然的表情。他用冷峻的目光把你从头到脚打量了一番。除了西奥多拉，还从没有人敢这样放肆对你。{/n}“我们来谈一谈吧，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。”

languages.text: {n}El mismo hombre a quien habías visto entre los invitados te espera en tus aposentos con el aspecto de alguien que está donde debe estar. Te mira con frialdad de la cabeza a los pies, evaluándote. Nadie te había mirado así a excepción de Theodora.{/n} «Tenemos que hablar, {name} von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}El mismo hombre a quien habías visto entre los invitados te espera en tus aposentos con el aspecto de alguien que está donde debe estar. Te mira con frialdad de la cabeza a los pies, evaluándote. Nadie te había mirado así a excepción de Theodora.{/n} «Tenemos que hablar, {name} von Valancius».

languages.text: {n}L'homme que vous aviez déjà remarqué parmi les invités vous attend dans vos quartiers avec l'air de quelqu'un qui est parfaitement à sa place. À votre arrivée, il vous jauge d'un regard froid en vous examinant ostensiblement des pieds à la tête. Personne en dehors de Théodora n'avait jamais pris la liberté de vous regarder de la sorte.{/n} « Nous devons parler, {name} von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme que vous aviez déjà remarqué parmi les invités vous attend dans vos quartiers avec l'air de quelqu'un qui est parfaitement à sa place. À votre arrivée, il vous jauge d'un regard froid en vous examinant ostensiblement des pieds à la tête. Personne en dehors de Théodora n'avait jamais pris la liberté de vous regarder de la sorte.{/n} « Nous devons parler, {name} von Valancius. »

languages.text: {n}Derselbe Mann, den du schon unter deinen Gästen gesehen hast, wartet in deinen Gemächern auf dich, und er macht den Eindruck, als sei das völlig in Ordnung. Er mustert dich kalt und prüfend von Kopf bis Fuß. Niemand außer Theodora hat sich jemals die Freiheit genommen, dich so anzusehen.{/n} "Wir müssen einiges besprechen, {name} von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derselbe Mann, den du schon unter deinen Gästen gesehen hast, wartet in deinen Gemächern auf dich, und er macht den Eindruck, als sei das völlig in Ordnung. Er mustert dich kalt und prüfend von Kopf bis Fuß. Niemand außer Theodora hat sich jemals die Freiheit genommen, dich so anzusehen.{/n} "Wir müssen einiges besprechen, {name} von Valancius."

languages.text: {n}Konukların arasında gördüğün adam, tam da olması gereken yerde olan birinin bakışlarıyla seni odanda bekliyor. Sana tepeden tırnağa soğuk, ölçüp biçen bir bakış atıyor. Theodora hariç hiç kimse sana böyle bir bakış atabilme hakkını kendinde görmemişti.{/n} "Konuşmamız gereken şeyler var {name} von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}The same man you saw among your guests is waiting for you in your chambers with the look of someone who is supposed to be there. He casts a cold, assessing gaze over you from top to bottom. No one save Theodora has ever allowed themselves the liberty of looking at you in such a way.{/n} "We have matters to discuss, {name} von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Konukların arasında gördüğün adam, tam da olması gereken yerde olan birinin bakışlarıyla seni odanda bekliyor. Sana tepeden tırnağa soğuk, ölçüp biçen bir bakış atıyor. Theodora hariç hiç kimse sana böyle bir bakış atabilme hakkını kendinde görmemişti.{/n} "Konuşmamız gereken şeyler var {name} von Valancius."
